writer_instructions.intro_format: MANDATORY: 100-150 words total. Start with direct verdict (40-50 words), then affiliate disclosure (50-75 words). NO 'Welcome to' or 'Looking for' openings.
writer_instructions.no_dated_language: NEVER include year or date in H1. Use Last Updated badge instead.
writer_instructions.tone: Professional, informative, helpful. Neutral assessment with balanced pros/cons.
writer_instructions.canadian_focus: Emphasize CAD currency, Interac payments, provincial regulations, Canadian customer support hours throughout content
writer_instructions.citation_requirements: Cite Treasure Spins official site for features, licensing authority for verification, user reviews from Trustpilot/AskGamblers
quality_standards: All CAD amounts must be accurate and current
Verify all bonus terms directly from Treasure Spins T&Cs
Include specific game titles, not just generic descriptions
Provide actual processing times for withdrawals
Include specific customer support hours in EST/PST
Verify licensing information from official authority
